addRole.cmdDescrp: Adds a role to the Cogworks database

subcmdDescrp.alias: What you refer to this role as

removeRole.cmdDescrp: Removes a role to the Cogworks database
removeRole.noType: Your server doesn't have any saved roles of this type!
removeRole.dne: This role doesn't exist in the database!

getRoles.cmdDescrp: Gets your saved roles from the Cogworks database
getRoles.noGuild: Your server doesn't have any roles!
